Built with Alectryon, running Coq+SerAPI v8.15.0+0.15.2. Bubbles () indicate interactive fragments: hover for details, tap to reveal contents. Use Ctrl+‚Üë Ctrl+‚Üì to navigate, Ctrl+üñ±Ô∏è to focus. On Mac, use ‚åò instead of Ctrl.
From Cdcl Require Import Itauto. #[local] Tactic Notation "itauto" := itauto auto.
From stdpp Require Import prelude.
From VLSM.Core Require Import VLSM VLSMProjections Composition (* Equivocation MessageDependencies*).

VLSM Projection Validators

In the sequel we fix VLSMs X and Y and some label_project and <state_project>> VLSM_projection mappings from X to Y.
The Transition Input Validation property validates an input corresponding to a projection by ensuring that that input can be "lifted" to the original vlsm. 
Section sec_input_validation_definitions.

Context
  `{X : VLSM message}
  {TY : VLSMType message}
  .

#[local] Notation labelTY := (@label _ TY).
#[local] Notation stateTY := (@state _ TY).

Context
  (label_project : vlabel X -> option labelTY)
  (state_project : vstate X -> stateTY)
  .

Record InputValidation
  (lY : labelTY)
  (sY : stateTY)
  (om : option message)
  (lX : vlabel X)
  (sX : vstate X)
  : Prop :=
{
  tiv_label_project : label_project lX = Some lY;
  tiv_state_project : state_project sX = sY;
  lifted_transition_input_valid : input_valid X lX (sX, om)
}.

Record TransitionValidation
  (lY : labelTY)
  (sY : stateTY)
  (om : option message)
  (lX : vlabel X)
  (sX : vstate X)
  (sX' : vstate X)
  (om' : option message)
  : Prop :=
{
  tv_tiv :> InputValidation lY sY om lX sX;
  tv_transition : vtransition X lX (sX, om) = (sX', om');
  tv_tiv_transition : input_valid_transition X lX (sX, om) (sX', om') :=
    conj (lifted_transition_input_valid lY sY om lX sX tv_tiv)
      tv_transition
}.

End sec_input_validation_definitions.

Section projection_validator.

Context
  `{X : VLSM message}
  (Y : VLSM message)
  (label_project : vlabel X -> option (vlabel Y))
  (state_project : vstate X -> vstate Y)
  (PreY := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y)
  .
We say that Y is a validator X w.r.t. the projection determined by label_project and state_project if input_validity in the component (for reachable states) implies TransitionInputValidation. 
Definition projection_validator_prop :=
  forall li si omi,
    input_valid PreY li (si,omi) ->
    exists lX sX, InputValidation label_project state_project li si omi lX sX.
We say that Y is a transition_validator if any valid transition (from a reachable state) in Y can be "lifted" to an input_valid_transition in X. 
Definition transition_validator :=
  forall lY sY omi, input_valid PreY lY (sY, omi) ->
  exists lX sX sX' om',
    TransitionValidation label_project state_project lY sY omi lX sX sX' om'.
A message validator can check within a component whether the message is valid for the composition. 
Definition message_validator_prop :=
  forall li si im,
    input_valid PreY li (si, Some im) ->
    valid_message_prop X im.
The projection_validator_property is stronger. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
projection_validator_prop ‚Üí message_validator_prop


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
projection_validator_prop ‚Üí message_validator_prop

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop
li: label
si: state
im: message
Hvi: input_valid PreY li (si, Some im)
valid_message_prop X im

  by apply Hvalidator in Hvi as (_ & _ & [_ _ (_ & ? & _)]).
Qed.


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
projection_validator_prop ‚Üí transition_validator


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
projection_validator_prop ‚Üí transition_validator

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop
li: label
si: state
omi: option message
Hpvi: input_valid PreY li (si, omi)
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX sX' : vstate X) (om' : option
                                               message),
  TransitionValidation label_project state_project li
    si omi lX sX sX' om'

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop
li: label
si: state
omi: option message
l: vlabel X
s: vstate X
Hiv: InputValidation label_project state_project li
  si omi l s
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX sX' : vstate X) (om' : option
                                               message),
  TransitionValidation label_project state_project li
    si omi lX sX sX' om'

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop
li: label
si: state
omi: option message
l: vlabel X
s: vstate X
Hiv: InputValidation label_project state_project li
  si omi l s
s': state
omo: option message
Ht: vtransition X l (s, omi) = (s', omo)
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX sX' : vstate X) (om' : option
                                               message),
  TransitionValidation label_project state_project li
    si omi lX sX sX' om'

  eexists l, s, s', omo; split with (tv_tiv := Hiv) (tv_transition := Ht).
Qed.


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
transition_validator ‚Üí projection_validator_prop


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
transition_validator ‚Üí projection_validator_prop

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: transition_validator
li: label
si: state
omi: option message
Hpvi: input_valid PreY li (si, omi)
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX : vstate X),
  InputValidation label_project state_project li si
    omi lX sX

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hvalidator: transition_validator
li: label
si: state
omi: option message
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
tv_tiv0: InputValidation label_project state_project
  li si omi lX sX
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX : vstate X),
  InputValidation label_project state_project li si
    omi lX sX

  by eexists _, _.
Qed.

End projection_validator.

Induced VLSM validators

Given an existing VLSM, a target VLSM_type, a state_projection map, and a partial label_projection map, and some corresponding reverse maps state_lift and label_lift we can build a new VLSM over the target type, induced by the source VLSM, its missing components being defined based on the source components.
If additionally some consistency (weak_projection_transition_consistency_None and weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some) properties are satisfied, then the induced VLSM is a VLSM_projection of the source one. 
Section sec_projection_induced_validator.

Section sec_projection_induced_validator_pre_definitions.

Context
  {message : Type}
  {TX TY : VLSMType message}
  .

#[local] Notation labelTX := (@label _ TX).
#[local] Notation stateTX := (@state _ TX).
#[local] Notation labelTY := (@label _ TY).
#[local] Notation stateTY := (@state _ TY).

Context
  (label_project : labelTX -> option labelTY)
  (state_project : stateTX -> stateTY)
  (label_lift : labelTY -> labelTX)
  (state_lift : stateTY -> stateTX)
  .
label_project is a left-inverse of label_lift 
Definition induced_validator_label_lift_prop : Prop :=
  forall lY, label_project (label_lift lY) = Some lY.
state_project is a left-inverse of state_lift 
Definition induced_validator_state_lift_prop : Prop :=
  forall sY, state_project (state_lift sY) = sY.

End sec_projection_induced_validator_pre_definitions.

Context
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  (TY : VLSMType message)
  .

#[local] Notation labelTY := (@label _ TY).
#[local] Notation stateTY := (@state _ TY).
#[local] Notation transition_itemTY := (@transition_item _ TY).

Context
  (label_project : vlabel X -> option labelTY)
  (state_project : vstate X -> stateTY)
  (trace_project := pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project _ _ label_project state_project)
  (label_lift : labelTY -> vlabel X)
  (state_lift : stateTY -> vstate X)
  .

Definition projection_induced_initial_state_prop (sY : stateTY) : Prop :=
  exists sX, state_project sX = sY /\ vinitial_state_prop X sX.

Instance projection_induced_initial_state_inh : Inhabited (sig projection_induced_initial_state_prop)
  := populate (exist _ (state_project (` (vs0 X))) (ex_intro _ _ (conj (eq_refl _) (proj2_sig _)))).

Definition projection_induced_initial_message_prop : message -> Prop := const False.

Definition projection_induced_transition
  (lY : labelTY)
  (somY : stateTY * option message)
  : stateTY * option message :=
  let (sY, om) := somY in
  let (s'X, om') := vtransition X (label_lift lY) (state_lift sY, om) in
  (state_project s'X, om').

Definition projection_induced_valid
  (lY : labelTY)
  (somY : stateTY * option message)
  : Prop :=
  exists lX sX, InputValidation label_project state_project lY somY.1 somY.2 lX sX.

Definition projection_induced_validator_machine : VLSMMachine TY :=
  {| initial_message_prop := projection_induced_initial_message_prop
   ; initial_state_prop := projection_induced_initial_state_prop
   ; transition := projection_induced_transition
   ;  valid := projection_induced_valid
  |}.

Definition projection_induced_validator : VLSM message :=
  mk_vlsm projection_induced_validator_machine.

Definition pre_projection_induced_validator : VLSM message :=
  pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm projection_induced_validator.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
projection_validator_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator label_project
  state_project


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
projection_validator_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator label_project
  state_project
 by intros li si omi (_ & _ & Hv). Qed.
When we have a VLSM_projection to the projection_induced_validator, validity is input_validity. 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hproj: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: label
s: state
om: option message
vvalid projection_induced_validator l (s, om)
‚Üí input_valid pre_projection_induced_validator l
    (s, om)


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hproj: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: label
s: state
om: option message
vvalid projection_induced_validator l (s, om)
‚Üí input_valid pre_projection_induced_validator l
    (s, om)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hproj: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: label
s: state
om: option message
Hv: vvalid projection_induced_validator l (s, om)
input_valid pre_projection_induced_validator l (s, om)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hproj: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: label
om: option message
sX: vstate X
Hv: vvalid projection_induced_validator l
  (state_project sX, om)
lX: vlabel X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
Hps: valid_state_prop X sX
Hopm: option_valid_message_prop X
  (state_project sX, om).2
input_valid pre_projection_induced_validator l
  (state_project sX, om)

  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item

  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project

  (state_project sX, om)

  (state_project sX, om).2

  (state_project sX)

  state_project: list transition_item

  label_project state_project

  (state_project sX, om)

HlX: label_project lX = Some l

Hopm: option_valid_message_prop X
  (state_project sX, om).2
option_valid_message_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator om

  state_project: list transition_item

  (state_project sX, om)

  (state_project sX, om).2
valid_state_prop pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project sX)
 by eapply VLSM_projection_valid_state.

message: Type

  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY

Hproj: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: label
m: message
sX: vstate X
Hv: vvalid projection_induced_validator l
  (state_project sX, Some m)
lX: vlabel X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
Hps: valid_state_prop X sX
Hopm: option_valid_message_prop X
  (state_project sX, Some m).2
option_valid_message_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator (Some m)

    by apply option_initial_message_is_valid.
Qed.

Section sec_projection_induced_validator_as_projection.
Transitions through states and labels with the same projections using the same message should lead to the same output message and states with the same projections. 
Definition induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some : Prop :=
  forall lX1 lX2 lY, label_project lX1 = Some lY -> label_project lX2 = Some lY ->
  forall sX1 sX2, state_project sX1 = state_project sX2 ->
  forall iom sX1' oom1, vtransition X lX1 (sX1, iom) = (sX1', oom1) ->
  forall sX2' oom2, vtransition X lX2 (sX2, iom) = (sX2', oom2) ->
  state_project sX1' = state_project sX2' /\ oom1 = oom2.
A weaker version of induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some. Only used locally. 
#[local] Definition weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  : Prop :=
  forall lX lY, label_project lX = Some lY ->
  forall s1 om s1' om1', input_valid_transition X lX (s1, om) (s1', om1') ->
  forall s2' om2', vtransition X (label_lift lY) (state_lift (state_project s1), om) = (s2', om2') ->
  state_project s1' = state_project s2' /\ om1' = om2'.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project
  label_lift
‚Üí induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project
    state_lift
  ‚Üí induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
    ‚Üí weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project
  label_lift
‚Üí induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project
    state_lift
  ‚Üí induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
    ‚Üí weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlbl: induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project
  label_lift
Hst: induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project
  state_lift
Htrans: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
lX: vlabel X
lY: labelTY
HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some lY
sX1: state
iom: option message
sX1': state
oom1: option message
Ht1: transition lX (sX1, iom) = (sX1', oom1)
sX2': state
oom2: option message
Ht2: vtransition X (label_lift lY)
  (state_lift (state_project sX1), iom) =
(sX2', oom2)
state_project sX1' = state_project sX2' ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  eapply Htrans; [done | auto | symmetry; eauto | done | done].
Qed.

Context
  (Hlabel_lift : induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project label_lift)
  (Hstate_lift : induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project state_lift)
  (Htransition_consistency : induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some)
  (Htransition_Some  : weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
    := basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency)
  .
Under transition-consistency assumptions, valid messages of the projection_induced_validator coincide with those of the source VLSM. 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
‚àÄ om : option message,
  option_valid_message_prop
    projection_induced_validator om
  ‚Üí option_valid_message_prop X om

TY: VLSMType message

  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item

  state_project state_lift

  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
‚àÄ om : option message,
  option_valid_message_prop
    projection_induced_validator om
  ‚Üí option_valid_message_prop X om

  projection_induced_validator s om

message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY

  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY

state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
s: state
_om: option message
Hsom1: valid_state_message_prop
  projection_induced_validator s _om
_s: state
om: option message
Hsom2: valid_state_message_prop
  projection_induced_validator _s om
l: label
Hv: valid l (s, om)
s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHsom1: option_valid_message_prop X _om
IHHsom2: option_valid_message_prop X om
option_valid_message_prop X om'

s: state
Hs: initial_state_prop s
om: option message
Hom: option_initial_message_prop om
option_valid_message_prop X om
 by destruct om as [m |]; [done |]; apply option_valid_message_None.

message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message

l: label
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some l
H: state_project sX = s
HsX: valid_state_prop X sX
HomX: option_valid_message_prop X (s, om).2
Hv: valid lX (sX, (s, om).2)
s': state
om': option message

message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message

_om: option message
sX: vstate X

  projection_induced_validator
  (state_project sX) _om
_s: state
om: option message
Hsom2: valid_state_message_prop
  projection_induced_validator _s om
l: label
lX: vlabel X
HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: valid_state_prop X sX
Hv: valid lX (sX, (state_project sX, om).2)
HomX: option_valid_message_prop X
  (state_project sX, om).2
om': option message
_s'X: state
H_tX: vtransition X (label_lift l)
  (state_lift (state_project sX), om) =
(_s'X, om')

IHHsom2: option_valid_message_prop X om
option_valid_message_prop X om'

message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
_om: option message
sX: vstate X

  projection_induced_validator
  (state_project sX) _om
_s: state
om: option message
Hsom2: valid_state_message_prop
  projection_induced_validator _s om
l: label
lX: vlabel X

HsX: valid_state_prop X sX
Hv: valid lX (sX, (state_project sX, om).2)
HomX: option_valid_message_prop X
  (state_project sX, om).2
om': option message
_s'X: state

  (state_lift (state_project sX), om) =
(_s'X, om')
IHHsom1: option_valid_message_prop X _om
IHHsom2: option_valid_message_prop X om
s'X: state
_om': option message
HtX: vtransition X lX (sX, om) = (s'X, _om')
HivtX: input_valid_transition X lX 
  (sX, om) (s'X, _om')
option_valid_message_prop X _om'

    by eapply input_valid_transition_out.
Qed.

Context
  (Htransition_None : weak_projection_transition_consistency_None _ _ label_project state_project)
  (Htype : VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project state_project :=
    basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project state_project Htransition_None)
  .


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_projection X pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project

  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY

  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_projection X pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
HlX: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
om: option message
Hv: input_valid X lX (s, om)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator om
vvalid pre_projection_induced_validator lY
  (state_project s, om)

  label_project label_lift

  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some

  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
H: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
om: option message

om': option message
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
vtransition pre_projection_induced_validator lY
  (state_project s, om) = 
(state_project s', om')
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
H: label_project lX = None
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
state_project s' = state_project s
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message

trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY

  label_project label_lift

  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some

  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
s: state
H: vinitial_state_prop X s
vinitial_state_prop pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
HlX: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid X lX (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
valid_message_prop pre_projection_induced_validator m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
HlX: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
om: option message
Hv: input_valid X lX (s, om)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator om
vvalid pre_projection_induced_validator lY
  (state_project s, om)
 by exists lX, s.
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
H: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
vtransition pre_projection_induced_validator lY
  (state_project s, om) = (state_project s', om')
 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
Htransition_Some: ‚àÄ (s2' : state) (om2' : 
                 option message),
  vtransition X (label_lift lY)
    (state_lift (state_project s),
    om) = (s2', om2')
  ‚Üí state_project s' =
    state_project s2' ‚àß 
    om' = om2'
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
H: label_project lX = Some lY
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
(let (s'X, om') :=
   vtransition X (label_lift lY)
     (state_lift (state_project s), om) in
 (state_project s'X, om')) = (state_project s', om')

    
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
s2': state
om2': option message
Htransition_Some: ‚àÄ (s2'0 : state) (om2'0 : 
                  option message),
  (s2', om2') = (s2'0, om2'0)
  ‚Üí state_project s' =
    state_project s2'0
    ‚àß om' = om2'0
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
H: label_project lX = Some lY
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
(state_project s2', om2') = (state_project s', om')

    by specialize (Htransition_Some _ _ eq_refl) as [-> ->].
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
H: label_project lX = None
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H0: input_valid_transition X lX (s, om) (s', om')
state_project s' = state_project s
 by eapply Htransition_None.
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
s: state
H: vinitial_state_prop X s
vinitial_state_prop pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
 by exists s.
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
lX: vlabel X
lY: vlabel pre_projection_induced_validator
HlX: label_project lX = Some lY
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid X lX (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  (state_project s)
valid_message_prop pre_projection_induced_validator m
 by destruct Hv as [_ [Hm _]]; apply initial_message_is_valid.
Qed.

Section projection_induced_friendliness.

Context
  (Hproj := projection_induced_validator_is_projection)
  .


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
item: transition_itemTY
pre_VLSM_projection_transition_item_project (type X)
  TY label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project TY
     (type X) label_lift state_lift item) = Some item


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
item: transition_itemTY
pre_VLSM_projection_transition_item_project (type X)
  TY label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project TY
     (type X) label_lift state_lift item) = Some item

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: labelTY
input: option message
destination: stateTY
output: option message
pre_VLSM_projection_transition_item_project (type X)
  TY label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project TY
     (type X) label_lift state_lift
     {|
       l := l;
       input := input;
       destination := destination;
       output := output
     |}) =
Some
  {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
l: labelTY
input: option message
destination: stateTY
output: option message
match
  label_project
    (VLSM.l
       {|
         l :=
           label_lift
             (VLSM.l
                {|
                  l := l;
                  input := input;
                  destination := destination;
                  output := output
                |});
         input :=
           VLSM.input
             {|
               l := l;
               input := input;
               destination := destination;
               output := output
             |};
         destination :=
           state_lift
             (VLSM.destination
                {|
                  l := l;
                  input := input;
                  destination := destination;
                  output := output
                |});
         output :=
           VLSM.output
             {|
               l := l;
               input := input;
               destination := destination;
               output := output
             |}
       |})
with
| Some lY =>
    Some
      {|
        l := lY;
        input :=
          VLSM.input
            {|
              l :=
                label_lift
                  (VLSM.l
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |});
              input :=
                VLSM.input
                  {|
                    l := l;
                    input := input;
                    destination := destination;
                    output := output
                  |};
              destination :=
                state_lift
                  (VLSM.destination
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |});
              output :=
                VLSM.output
                  {|
                    l := l;
                    input := input;
                    destination := destination;
                    output := output
                  |}
            |};
        destination :=
          state_project
            (VLSM.destination
               {|
                 l :=
                   label_lift
                     (VLSM.l
                        {|
                          l := l;
                          input := input;
                          destination := destination;
                          output := output
                        |});
                 input :=
                   VLSM.input
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |};
                 destination :=
                   state_lift
                     (VLSM.destination
                        {|
                          l := l;
                          input := input;
                          destination := destination;
                          output := output
                        |});
                 output :=
                   VLSM.output
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |}
               |});
        output :=
          VLSM.output
            {|
              l :=
                label_lift
                  (VLSM.l
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |});
              input :=
                VLSM.input
                  {|
                    l := l;
                    input := input;
                    destination := destination;
                    output := output
                  |};
              destination :=
                state_lift
                  (VLSM.destination
                     {|
                       l := l;
                       input := input;
                       destination := destination;
                       output := output
                     |});
              output :=
                VLSM.output
                  {|
                    l := l;
                    input := input;
                    destination := destination;
                    output := output
                  |}
            |}
      |}
| None => None
end =
Some
  {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}

  by cbn; rewrite Hlabel_lift, Hstate_lift.
Qed.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
tr: list transition_itemTY
pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project (type X) TY
  label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project TY
     (type X) label_lift state_lift tr) = tr


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
tr: list transition_itemTY
pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project (type X) TY
  label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project TY
     (type X) label_lift state_lift tr) = tr

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
a: transition_itemTY
tr: list transition_itemTY
IHtr: pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project state_project
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     TY (type X) label_lift state_lift tr) = tr
match
  pre_VLSM_projection_transition_item_project (type X)
    TY label_project state_project
    (pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
       TY (type X) label_lift state_lift a)
with
| Some b =>
    b
    :: pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
         (type X) TY label_project state_project
         (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
            TY (type X) label_lift state_lift tr)
| None =>
    pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project (type X)
      TY label_project state_project
      (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
         TY (type X) label_lift state_lift tr)
end = a :: tr

  by rewrite induced_validator_transition_item_lift; f_equal.
Qed.
If there is a way to "lift" valid traces of the projection_induced_validator to the original VLSM, then the induced VLSM_projection is friendly. 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
VLSM_full_projection pre_projection_induced_validator
  X label_lift state_lift
‚Üí projection_friendly_prop Hproj


message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
VLSM_full_projection pre_projection_induced_validator
  X label_lift state_lift
‚Üí projection_friendly_prop Hproj

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
Hfull_proj: VLSM_full_projection
  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift
isY: vstate pre_projection_induced_validator
trY: list
  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
‚àÉ (sX : vstate X) (trX : list (vtransition_item X)),
  finite_valid_trace X sX trX
  ‚àß state_project sX = isY
    ‚àß VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project Hproj trX =
      trY

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
Hfull_proj: VLSM_full_projection
  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift
isY: vstate pre_projection_induced_validator
trY: list
  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
finite_valid_trace X (state_lift isY)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     Hfull_proj trY)
‚àß state_project (state_lift isY) = isY
  ‚àß VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project Hproj
      (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
         Hfull_proj trY) = trY

     Hfull_proj trY)
message: Type
X: VLSM message

  state_project: list transition_item

  state_project state_lift

  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)

  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
state_project (state_lift isY) = isY
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY

state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X

  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some

  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some

  X TY label_project state_project

  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project

  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project

  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift

  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)

  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project Hproj
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     Hfull_proj trY) = trY

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
Hfull_proj: VLSM_full_projection
  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift
isY: vstate pre_projection_induced_validator
trY: list
  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
finite_valid_trace X (state_lift isY)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     Hfull_proj trY)
 by apply (VLSM_full_projection_finite_valid_trace Hfull_proj).
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
Hfull_proj: VLSM_full_projection
  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift
isY: vstate pre_projection_induced_validator
trY: list
  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
state_project (state_lift isY) = isY
 done.
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  (type X) TY label_project
  state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_itemTY
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí vstate X
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X TY label_project state_project
Htype:= basic_VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project Htransition_None: VLSM_projection_type X TY label_project
  state_project
Hproj:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection: VLSM_projection X
  pre_projection_induced_validator
  label_project state_project
Hfull_proj: VLSM_full_projection
  pre_projection_induced_validator X
  label_lift state_lift
isY: vstate pre_projection_induced_validator
trY: list
  (vtransition_item
     pre_projection_induced_validator)
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  pre_projection_induced_validator isY trY
VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project Hproj
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     Hfull_proj trY) = trY
 by apply induced_validator_trace_lift.
Qed.

End projection_induced_friendliness.

End sec_projection_induced_validator_as_projection.

End sec_projection_induced_validator.

Section sec_projection_induced_validator_incl.

Context
  {message : Type}
  {TX : VLSMType message}
  (TY : VLSMType message)
  .

#[local] Notation labelTX := (@label _ TX).
#[local] Notation stateTX := (@state _ TX).
#[local] Notation labelTY := (@label _ TY).
#[local] Notation stateTY := (@state _ TY).

Context
  (label_project : labelTX -> option labelTY)
  (state_project : stateTX -> stateTY)
  (trace_project := pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project _ _ label_project state_project)
  (label_lift : labelTY -> labelTX)
  (state_lift : stateTY -> stateTX)
  (Hlabel_lift : induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project label_lift)
  (Hstate_lift : induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project state_lift)
  .
Under weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some assumptions, VLSM_inclusion between source VLSMs implies VLSM_inclusion between their projections induced by the same maps. 
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_incl X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_incl XY1 XY2


message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_incl X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_incl XY1 XY2

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
VLSM_incl X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_incl XY1 XY2

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
VLSM_incl X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_incl XY1 XY2

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
VLSM_incl XY1 XY2

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
‚àÄ (s : vstate
         {|
           vtype := vtype XY1;
           vmachine :=
             pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
               (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
                  label_project state_project
                  label_lift state_lift)
         |}) (tr : list
                     (vtransition_item
                        {|
                          vtype := vtype XY1;
                          vmachine :=
                            pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
                              (projection_induced_validator
                                 X1 TY label_project
                                 state_project
                                 label_lift state_lift)
                        |})),
  finite_valid_trace
    {|
      vtype := vtype XY1;
      vmachine :=
        pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
          (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
             label_project state_project label_lift
             state_lift)
    |} s tr
  ‚Üí finite_valid_trace
      {|
        vtype := vtype XY1;
        vmachine :=
          pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
            (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
               label_project state_project label_lift
               state_lift)
      |} s tr

s1: vstate X1
Hs1_pr: state_project s1 = is
Hs1: vinitial_state_prop X1 s1
vinitial_state_prop XY2 is

    by exists s1; split; [| apply VLSM_incl_initial_state].

MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message

  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message

  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
