Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
His: ‚àÄ s : state,
  vinitial_state_prop XY1 s
  ‚Üí vinitial_state_prop XY2 s
si: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
sf: state
iom, oom: option message
l: label
Hx: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si (tr ++ [x])

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
His: ‚àÄ s : state,
  vinitial_state_prop XY1 s
  ‚Üí vinitial_state_prop XY2 s
si: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
sf: state
iom, oom: option message
l: label
Hx: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
finite_valid_trace_from XY2 si tr
‚àß finite_valid_trace_from XY2
    (finite_trace_last si tr) [x]

HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some l
HsX_pr: state_project sX =
(finite_trace_last si tr, iom).1
HpvX1: input_valid X1 lX
  (sX, (finite_trace_last si tr, iom).2)
_s'X: state
H_tX1: vtransition X1 (label_lift l)
  (state_lift (finite_trace_last si tr), iom) =
(_s'X, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := state_project _s'X;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
s'X: state
_oom: option message
HtX1: vtransition X1 lX (sX, iom) = (s'X, _oom)
HivtX1: input_valid_transition X1 lX 
  (sX, iom) (s'X, _oom)
input_valid_transition XY2 l
  (finite_trace_last si tr, iom)
  (state_project _s'X, oom)

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
His: ‚àÄ s : state,
  vinitial_state_prop XY1 s
  ‚Üí vinitial_state_prop XY2 s
si: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
iom, oom: option message
l: label
lX: vlabel X1
sX: vstate X1
HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some l
HsX_pr: state_project sX = finite_trace_last si tr
HpvX1: input_valid X1 lX
  (sX, (finite_trace_last si tr, iom).2)
_s'X: state
H_tX1: vtransition X1 (label_lift l)
  (state_lift (state_project sX), iom) =
(_s'X, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := state_project _s'X;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item

  (state_project _s'X, oom)

        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
HivtX1: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype X1; vmachine := machine X2
  |} lX (sX, iom) (s'X, oom)
HtX1: vtransition X1 lX (sX, iom) = (s'X, oom)
transition l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) =
(state_project _s'X, oom)

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some1:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency1: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Htransition_Some2:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency2: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hincl: VLSM_incl X1 X2
His: ‚àÄ s : state,
  vinitial_state_prop XY1 s
  ‚Üí vinitial_state_prop XY2 s
si: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
iom, oom: option message
l: label
lX: vlabel X1
sX: vstate X1
HlX_pr: label_project lX = Some l
HsX_pr: state_project sX = finite_trace_last si tr
HpvX1: input_valid X1 lX
  (sX, (finite_trace_last si tr, iom).2)
_s'X, s'X: state
Heq_s'X_pr: state_project s'X = state_project _s'X
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := state_project _s'X;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
HivtX1: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype X1; vmachine := machine X2
  |} lX (sX, iom) (s'X, oom)
HtX1: vtransition X1 lX (sX, iom) = (s'X, oom)
valid_state_prop XY2 (finite_trace_last si tr)
 by eapply finite_valid_trace_last_pstate.

(let (s'X, om') :=
   vtransition X2 (label_lift l)
     (state_lift (state_project sX), iom) in
 (state_project s'X, om')) = (state_project _s'X, oom)

  (state_lift (state_project sX), iom) =
(_s'X2, _oom)

(state_project _s'X, oom)

    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si tr
HtX1: vtransition X1 lX (sX, iom) = (s'X, _oom)
HivtX1: input_valid_transition
  {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |} lX
  (sX, iom) (s'X, _oom)
_s'X2: state
H: state_project s'X = state_project _s'X2
(state_project _s'X2, _oom) =
(state_project _s'X, _oom)

    congruence.
Qed.
Under weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some assumptions, VLSM_equality between source VLSMs implies VLSM_equality between their projections induced by the same maps. 
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_eq X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_eq XY1 XY2


message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item
label_lift: labelTY ‚Üí labelTX
state_lift: stateTY ‚Üí stateTX
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message
XY1:= pre_projection_induced_validator X1 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message

  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_eq X1 X2 ‚Üí VLSM_eq XY1 XY2

  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY

  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item

  label_project label_lift

  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX
X1:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX1 |}: VLSM message
X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message

  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message

  X1 TY label_project
  state_project
Htransition_consistency2: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Heq: VLSM_eq X1 X2
VLSM_incl
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}

  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message

  state_lift: VLSM message

  state_project

  state_project

VLSM_incl
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}
 by apply (projection_induced_validator_incl MX1 MX2); [..| apply VLSM_eq_proj1].
  
message: Type
TX, TY: VLSMType message
label_project: labelTX ‚Üí option labelTY
state_project: stateTX ‚Üí stateTY
trace_project:= pre_VLSM_projection_finite_trace_project
  TX TY label_project state_project: list transition_item
‚Üí list transition_item

  label_project label_lift

  state_project state_lift
MX1, MX2: VLSMMachine TX

X2:= {| vtype := TX; vmachine := MX2 |}: VLSM message

  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
XY2:= pre_projection_induced_validator X2 TY
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Htransition_consistency1: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X1 TY label_project
  state_project

  X2 TY label_project
  state_project
Heq: VLSM_eq X1 X2
VLSM_incl
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X2 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := vtype XY1;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X1 TY
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |}
 by apply (projection_induced_validator_incl MX2 MX1); [..| apply VLSM_eq_proj2].
Qed.

End sec_projection_induced_validator_incl.

Projection validators and Byzantine behavior

In the sequel we assume that the projection_induced_validator_is_projection and that initial states of Y can be lifted to X. 
Section induced_validator_validators.

Context
  `{X : VLSM message}
  (Y : VLSM message)
  (label_project : vlabel X -> option (vlabel Y))
  (state_project : vstate X -> vstate Y)
  (Htransition_None : weak_projection_transition_consistency_None _ _ label_project state_project)
  (label_lift : vlabel Y -> vlabel X)
  (state_lift : vstate Y -> vstate X)
  (Xi := pre_projection_induced_validator X (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift state_lift)
  (Hlabel_lift : induced_validator_label_lift_prop label_project label_lift)
  (Hstate_lift : induced_validator_state_lift_prop state_project state_lift)
  (Hinitial_lift : strong_projection_initial_state_preservation Y X state_lift)
  (Htransition_consistency :
    induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some _ _ label_project state_project)
  (Htransition_Some
    : weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
        _ _ label_project state_project label_lift state_lift
    := basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
        _ _ _ _ _ _ Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency)
  (Hproji :=
    projection_induced_validator_is_projection
      _ _ _ _ _ _ Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency Htransition_None)
  (PreY := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y)
  (Hproj : VLSM_projection X PreY label_project state_project)
  .
If there is a VLSM_projection from X to PreY and the projection_induced_validator_is_projection, then a transition valid for the projection_induced_validator has the same output as the transition on Y. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (om : option message),
  vvalid Xi l (s, om)
  ‚Üí vtransition Xi l (s, om) = vtransition Y l (s, om)


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X

  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message

  label_project label_lift

  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

  (type Y) label_project state_project

  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X

  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (om : option message),
  vvalid Xi l (s, om)
  ‚Üí vtransition Xi l (s, om) = vtransition Y l (s, om)

l: label
im: option message

Hlx: label_project lX = Some l
Hv: input_valid X lX (sX, (state_project sX, im).2)
vtransition Xi l (state_project sX, im) =
vtransition Y l (state_project sX, im)

l: label
im: option message

Hv: input_valid X lX (sX, (state_project sX, im).2)
vtransition Xi l (state_project sX, im) =
(state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
(vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2)

(state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
(vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2) =
vtransition Y l (state_project sX, im)

message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift

Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
l: label
im: option message
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
Hlx: label_project lX = Some l
Hv: input_valid X lX (sX, (state_project sX, im).2)
input_valid_transition X lX (sX, im)
  ((vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
  (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2)

    by erewrite injective_projections.
  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
l: label
im: option message
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
Hlx: label_project lX = Some l
Hv: input_valid X lX (sX, (state_project sX, im).2)
(state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
(vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2) =
vtransition Y l (state_project sX, im)
 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
l: label
im: option message
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
Hlx: label_project lX = Some l
Hv: input_valid X lX (sX, (state_project sX, im).2)
vtransition Y l (state_project sX, im) =
(state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
(vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2)

    
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X

  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project

  state_lift

  (type Y) label_project state_project

  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X

     label_lift state_lift) label_project

  state_project
l: label
im: option message

  ((vtransition X lX (sX, im)).1,
  (vtransition X lX (sX, im)).2)

    by erewrite injective_projections.
Qed.


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
VLSM_incl Xi PreY

        state_lift))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y)
 by intros is (s & <- & Hs); apply (VLSM_projection_initial_state Hproj).
  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  Y X state_lift

  state_project

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
        label_project state_project label_lift
        state_lift))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y)
 by intros l s m Hv HsY HmX; apply initial_message_is_valid.
  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
weak_incl_valid_preservation
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
        label_project state_project label_lift
        state_lift))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y)
 by intros l s om (_ & _ & lX & sX & [Hlx Heq Hv]) _ _; cbn in Heq; subst;
      simpl; eapply VLSM_projection_input_valid.
  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
weak_incl_transition_preservation
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
        label_project state_project label_lift
        state_lift))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y)
 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
HvXi: valid l (s, im)
HtXi: transition l (s, im) = (s', om)
vtransition Y l (s, im) = (s', om)

    by setoid_rewrite <- HtXi; rewrite <- projection_induced_valid_transition_eq.
Qed.
An alternative formulation of the projection_validator_property with a seemingly stronger hypothesis, states that Y is a validator for X if for any li, si, iom such that li valid (si, iom) in Y and si is a valid state in the induced projection Xi, implies that li valid (si, om) in the induced projection Xi (i.e., projection_induced_validity). 
Definition projection_validator_prop_alt :=
  forall li si iom,
    vvalid Y li (si, iom) ->
    valid_state_prop Xi si ->
    vvalid Xi li (si, iom).
Under validator assumptions, all reachable states for component Y are valid states in the induced projection Xi. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
projection_validator_prop_alt
‚Üí ‚àÄ s : state,
    valid_state_prop PreY s ‚Üí valid_state_prop Xi s

s': state
l: label
om, om': option message
s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
valid_state_prop Xi s'

  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some

  state_project

s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
valid_state_prop Xi
  (state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, om)).1)
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
s': state
l: label
om, om': option message
s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, om)).1 = s'

    
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X

  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project

  state_project
s': state
l: label
om, om': option message
s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
valid_state_prop Xi
  (state_project (vtransition X lX (sX, om)).1)
 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X

     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
s': state
l: label
om, om': option message
s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
transition lX (sX, (s, om).2) =
((vtransition X lX (sX, om)).1, ?om')

      by apply injective_projections.
    
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)

  state_project

  state_project

  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift

  state_lift

state_project (sX', _om').1 = s'

      
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
TY: VLSMType message
MY: VLSMMachine TY
label_project: vlabel X
‚Üí option
    (vlabel
       {|
         vtype := TY; vmachine := MY
       |})
state_project: vstate X
‚Üí vstate
    {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |}
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X
  (type
     {|
       vtype := TY; vmachine := MY
     |}) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |}
‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |}
‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X
  (type {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |})
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |} X
  state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X
  (type
     {|
       vtype := TY;
       vmachine := MY
     |}) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X
  (type
     {|
       vtype := TY; vmachine := MY
     |}) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X
  (type
     {|
       vtype := TY; vmachine := MY
     |}) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |})
  label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |})
     label_project state_project label_lift
     state_lift) label_project state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := TY; vmachine := MY |}: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
s': state
l: label
om, om': option message
s: state
Hvalid: valid l (s, om)
Htrans: (let
   (initial_state_prop, initial_state, _,
    initial_message_prop, initial_message,
    transition, _) := MY in
 transition) l (s, om) = 
(s', om')
IHHs: valid_state_prop Xi s
lX: vlabel X
sX: vstate X
HlX: label_project lX = Some l
HsX: state_project sX = (s, om).1
HvX: input_valid X lX (sX, (s, om).2)
sX': state
_om': option message
Hs': (let
   (initial_state_prop, initial_state, _,
    initial_message_prop, initial_message,
    transition, _) := MY in
 transition) l (s, om) =
(state_project sX', _om')
state_project (sX', _om').1 = s'

      by rewrite Htrans in Hs'; inversion Hs'.
Qed.
Below we show that the two definitions above are actually equivalent. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
projection_validator_prop_alt
‚Üî projection_validator_prop Y label_project
    state_project


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
projection_validator_prop_alt
‚Üî projection_validator_prop Y label_project
    state_project

  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop_alt
l: label
si: state
om: option message
Hvalid: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y) l
  (si, om)
‚àÉ (lX : vlabel X) (sX : vstate X),
  InputValidation label_project state_project l si om
    lX sX

  (si, om)

    apply validator_alt_free_states_are_projection_states; [done.. | apply Hvalid].

valid_state_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y)
  (si, om).1

    by revert HXisi; apply VLSM_incl_valid_state,
      induced_validator_incl_preloaded_with_all_messages.
Qed.

  state_project
projection_validator_prop_alt
‚Üí ‚àÄ s : state,
    valid_state_prop PreY s ‚Üí valid_state_prop Xi s

  by apply validator_alt_free_states_are_projection_states.
Qed.

Section pre_loaded_with_all_messages_validator_proj.

Context
  (Hvalidator : projection_validator_prop Y label_project state_project)
  .
We can show that PreY is included in Xi by applying the meta-lemma VLSM_incl_finite_traces_characterization, and by induction on the length of a trace. The projection_validator_property is used to translate input_validity for the PreY machine into the pre_projection_induced_validator. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
VLSM_incl PreY Xi


message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
VLSM_incl PreY Xi

  (* reduce inclusion to inclusion of finite traces. *)
  
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
‚àÄ (s : vstate
         {|
           vtype := vtype PreY;
           vmachine :=
             pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
               Y
         |}) (tr : list
                     (vtransition_item
                        {|
                          vtype := vtype PreY;
                          vmachine :=
                            pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
                              Y
                        |})),
  finite_valid_trace
    {|
      vtype := vtype PreY;
      vmachine :=
        pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y
    |} s tr
  ‚Üí finite_valid_trace
      {|
        vtype := vtype PreY;
        vmachine :=
          pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
            (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
               label_project state_project label_lift
               state_lift)
      |} s tr

  state_project

message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
si: state
tr: list transition_item
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        Y
  |} si tr
sf: state
iom, oom: option message
l: label
Hx: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y
  |} l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtrY: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X
           (type Y) label_project
           state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si tr
finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X 
           (type Y) label_project state_project
           label_lift state_lift)
  |} si (tr ++ [x])

    
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
si: state
H: initial_state_prop si
finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si []
 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
si: state
H: initial_state_prop si
initial_state_prop si

      
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X

     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project

  state_project

  state_project
si: state
H: initial_state_prop si
state_project (state_lift si) = si
‚àß vinitial_state_prop X (state_lift si)

      auto.
    
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift

Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
si: state
tr: list transition_item
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        Y
  |} si tr
sf: state
iom, oom: option message
l: label
Hx: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y
  |} l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtrY: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X
           (type Y) label_project
           state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si tr
finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X (type Y)
           label_project state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si (tr ++ [x])

  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X
           (type Y) label_project
           state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si tr
transition l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) =
vtransition Y l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom)

        
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)

Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None

  state_project

  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project

  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
si: state
tr: list transition_item
HtrY: finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        Y
  |} si tr
sf: state
iom, oom: option message
l: label
Hx: input_valid_transition
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine Y
  |} l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, oom)
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
IHHtrY: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreY;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator X
           (type Y) label_project
           state_project label_lift
           state_lift)
  |} si tr
projection_induced_valid X (type Y) label_project
  state_project l (finite_trace_last si tr, iom)

        apply Hvalidator, Hx.
Qed.
Given that any projection is included in the pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm of its component (Lemma proj_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_incl), we conclude that PreY and Xi are trace-equal. This means that all the byzantine behavior of a component which is a validator is exhibited by its corresponding projection. 
message: Type
X, Y: VLSM message
label_project: vlabel X ‚Üí option (vlabel Y)
state_project: vstate X ‚Üí vstate Y
Htransition_None: weak_projection_transition_consistency_None
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
label_lift: vlabel Y ‚Üí vlabel X
state_lift: vstate Y ‚Üí vstate X
Xi:= pre_projection_induced_validator X 
  (type Y) label_project state_project label_lift
  state_lift: VLSM message
Hlabel_lift: induced_validator_label_lift_prop
  label_project label_lift
Hstate_lift: induced_validator_state_lift_prop
  state_project state_lift
Hinitial_lift: strong_projection_initial_state_preservation
  Y X state_lift
Htransition_consistency: induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project
Htransition_Some:= basic_weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift Hlabel_lift Hstate_lift
  Htransition_consistency: weak_projection_transition_consistency_Some
  X (type Y) label_project
  state_project label_lift
  state_lift
Hproji:= projection_induced_validator_is_projection X
  (type Y) label_project state_project
  label_lift state_lift Hlabel_lift
  Hstate_lift Htransition_consistency
  Htransition_None: VLSM_projection X
  (pre_projection_induced_validator X
     (type Y) label_project state_project
     label_lift state_lift) label_project
  state_project
PreY:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Y: VLSM message
Hproj: VLSM_projection X PreY label_project
  state_project
Hvalidator: projection_validator_prop Y label_project
  state_project
VLSM_eq PreY Xi

Qed.

End pre_loaded_with_all_messages_validator_proj.

End induced_validator_validators.

Validator properties for the component_projection.

In this section we specialize the validator-related results to the components of a composition. 
Section component_projection_validator.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (i : index)
  (PreXi := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  .

Definition composite_project_label (l : composite_label IM)
  : option (vlabel (IM i)) :=
  match decide (i = (projT1 l)) with
  | left e => Some (eq_rect_r _ (projT2 l) e)
  | _ => None
  end.
The specialization of the more abstract projection_induced_validator to the projection from a composition to a component. 
Definition composite_vlsm_induced_validator : VLSM message :=
  projection_induced_validator X (type (IM i))
    composite_project_label (fun s => s i)
    (lift_to_composite_label IM i) (lift_to_composite_state' IM i).

Definition pre_composite_vlsm_induced_validator : VLSM message :=
  pre_projection_induced_validator X (type (IM i))
    composite_project_label (fun s => s i)
    (lift_to_composite_label IM i) (lift_to_composite_state' IM i).


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) i
composite_project_label (existT i lj) = Some lj


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) i
composite_project_label (existT i lj) = Some lj

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) i
match decide (i = i) with
| left e =>
    Some (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj e)
| right _ => None
end = Some lj

  by rewrite (decide_True_pi eq_refl).
Qed.

lj: vlabel (IM j)
HlX: composite_project_label (existT j lj) = None
sX: state
iom: option message
s'X: state
oom: option message
Ht: (let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) lj (sX j, iom) in
 (state_update IM sX j si', om')) = 
(s'X, oom)
s'X i = sX i

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

HlX: composite_project_label (existT j lj) = None
sX: state
iom, oom: option message
si': state
Ht: (state_update IM sX j si', oom) =
(state_update IM sX j si', oom)
state_update IM sX j si' i = sX i

  ‚Üí Prop

message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

HlX: match decide (i = i) with
| left e =>
    Some
      (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj
         e)
| right _ => None
end = None
sX: state
iom, oom: option message
si': state
Ht: (state_update IM sX i si', oom) =
(state_update IM sX i si', oom)
si' = sX i

  by case_decide.
Qed.

  ‚Üí Prop
