  (type (IM i)) composite_project_label
  (Œª s : vstate X, s i)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
induced_validator_transition_consistency_Some X
  (type (IM i)) composite_project_label
  (Œª s : vstate X, s i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
j1: index
lj1: vlabel (IM j1)
j2: index
lj2: vlabel (IM j2)
lj: label
match decide (i = j1) with
| left e =>
    Some
      (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj1 e)
| right _ => None
end = Some lj
‚Üí match decide (i = j2) with
  | left e =>
      Some
        (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj2 e)
  | right _ => None
  end = Some lj
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ sX1 sX2 : composite_state IM,
      sX1 i = sX2 i
      ‚Üí ‚àÄ (iom : option message) (sX1' : composite_state
                                           IM) (oom1 : 
                                                option
                                                 message),
          (let (si', om') :=
             vtransition (IM j1) lj1 (sX1 j1, iom) in
           (state_update IM sX1 j1 si', om')) =
          (sX1', oom1)
          ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : 
                                           option
                                             message),
              (let (si', om') :=
                 vtransition (IM j2) lj2 (sX2 j2, iom) in
               (state_update IM sX2 j2 si', om')) =
              (sX2', oom2)
              ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj1: vlabel (IM i)
j2: index
lj2: vlabel (IM j2)
lj: label
Some
  (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj1 eq_refl) =
Some lj
‚Üí match decide (i = j2) with
  | left e =>
      Some
        (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj2 e)
  | right _ => None
  end = Some lj
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ sX1 sX2 : composite_state IM,
      sX1 i = sX2 i
      ‚Üí ‚àÄ (iom : option message) (sX1' : composite_state
                                           IM) (oom1 : 
                                                option
                                                 message),
          (let (si', om') :=
             vtransition (IM i) lj1 (sX1 i, iom) in
           (state_update IM sX1 i si', om')) =
          (sX1', oom1)
          ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : 
                                           option
                                             message),
              (let (si', om') :=
                 vtransition (IM j2) lj2 (sX2 j2, iom) in
               (state_update IM sX2 j2 si', om')) =
              (sX2', oom2)
              ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
j2: index
lj2: vlabel (IM j2)
lj: label
match decide (i = j2) with
| left e =>
    Some
      (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj2 e)
| right _ => None
end = Some lj
‚Üí ‚àÄ sX1 sX2 : composite_state IM,
    sX1 i = sX2 i
    ‚Üí ‚àÄ (iom : option message) (sX1' : composite_state
                                         IM) (oom1 : 
                                              option
                                                message),
        (let (si', om') :=
           vtransition (IM i) lj (sX1 i, iom) in
         (state_update IM sX1 i si', om')) =
        (sX1', oom1)
        ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : option
                                                 message),
            (let (si', om') :=
               vtransition (IM j2) lj2 (sX2 j2, iom) in
             (state_update IM sX2 j2 si', om')) =
            (sX2', oom2)
            ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj2: vlabel (IM i)
lj: label
Some
  (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) lj2 eq_refl) =
Some lj
‚Üí ‚àÄ sX1 sX2 : composite_state IM,
    sX1 i = sX2 i
    ‚Üí ‚àÄ (iom : option message) (sX1' : composite_state
                                         IM) (oom1 : 
                                              option
                                                message),
        (let (si', om') :=
           vtransition (IM i) lj (sX1 i, iom) in
         (state_update IM sX1 i si', om')) =
        (sX1', oom1)

                                                 message),
            (let (si', om') :=
               vtransition (IM i) lj2 (sX2 i, iom) in
             (state_update IM sX2 i si', om')) =
            (sX2', oom2)
            ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: label
‚àÄ sX1 sX2 : composite_state IM,
  sX1 i = sX2 i
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (iom : option message) (sX1' : composite_state
                                       IM) (oom1 : 
                                            option
                                              message),
      (let (si', om') :=
         vtransition (IM i) lj (sX1 i, iom) in
       (state_update IM sX1 i si', om')) =
      (sX1', oom1)
      ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : option
                                                message),

             vtransition (IM i) lj (sX2 i, iom) in
           (state_update IM sX2 i si', om')) =
          (sX2', oom2) ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: label
sX1, sX2: composite_state IM
iom: option message
‚àÄ (sX1' : composite_state IM) (oom1 : option message),
  (let (si', om') :=
     vtransition (IM i) lj (sX1 i, iom) in
   (state_update IM sX1 i si', om')) = (sX1', oom1)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : option
                                            message),
      (let (si', om') :=
         vtransition (IM i) lj (sX1 i, iom) in
       (state_update IM sX2 i si', om')) =
      (sX2', oom2) ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: label
sX1, sX2: composite_state IM
iom: option message
si': state
om': option message
‚àÄ (sX1' : composite_state IM) (oom1 : option message),
  (state_update IM sX1 i si', om') = (sX1', oom1)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : option
                                            message),
      (state_update IM sX2 i si', om') = (sX2', oom2)
      ‚Üí sX1' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: label
sX1, sX2: composite_state IM
iom: option message
si': state
oom1: option message
‚àÄ (sX2' : composite_state IM) (oom2 : option message),
  (state_update IM sX2 i si', oom1) = (sX2', oom2)
  ‚Üí state_update IM sX1 i si' i = sX2' i ‚àß oom1 = oom2

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
lj: label
sX1, sX2: composite_state IM
iom: option message
si': state
oom2: option message
state_update IM sX1 i si' i =
state_update IM sX2 i si' i ‚àß oom2 = oom2

  by state_update_simpl.
Qed.
The projection_induced_validator by the composite_project_label and the projection of the state to the component is indeed a VLSM_projection. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_projection X pre_composite_vlsm_induced_validator
  composite_project_label (Œª s : vstate X, s i)

 apply component_label_projection_lift.

EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

weak_projection_transition_consistency_None X
  (type (IM i)) composite_project_label
  (Œª s : vstate X, s i)
 apply component_transition_projection_None.
Qed.

End component_projection_validator.

Section sec_component_projection_validator_alt.

Direct definition of induced validator from composition to component

In this section, we provide a definition of the induced validator from a composition to a component obtained by strengthening the component instead of deriving its elements via the projection composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator.
We then show this VLSM and some of its pre-loaded variants are VLSM_equal (trace-equivalent) to the corresponding variants of the composite_vlsm_induced_validator. 
Context
  {message : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (i : index)
  (PreXi := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  .
The composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validity is defined as the projection of the input_validity of X: 
Definition composite_vlsm_induced_projection_valid
  (li : vlabel (IM i))
  (siomi : vstate (IM i) * option message)
  :=
  let (si, omi) := siomi in
  exists s : vstate X,
    s i = si /\ input_valid X (existT i li) (s, omi).
Since the composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validity is derived from input_validity, which in turn depends on validity in the component, it is easy to see that it implies validity in the component. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
li: vlabel (IM i)
siomi: (vstate (IM i) * option message)%type
Hcomposite: composite_vlsm_induced_projection_valid
  li siomi
vvalid (IM i) li siomi


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
li: vlabel (IM i)
siomi: (vstate (IM i) * option message)%type
Hcomposite: composite_vlsm_induced_projection_valid
  li siomi
vvalid (IM i) li siomi
 by destruct siomi, Hcomposite as (s & <- & _ & _ & []). Qed.
We define the induced projection validator of X to index i as the VLSM obtained by changing the validity predicate of IM i to composite_vlsm_induced_projection_valid. 
Definition composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator_machine
  : VLSMMachine (type (IM i)) :=
{|
  initial_state_prop := vinitial_state_prop (IM i);
  initial_message_prop := vinitial_message_prop (IM i);
  s0 := populate (vs0 (IM i));
  transition :=  vtransition (IM i);
  valid := composite_vlsm_induced_projection_valid;
|}.

Definition composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator : VLSM message :=
  mk_vlsm composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator_machine.

Definition pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator : VLSM message :=
  pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
VLSM_eq
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator P)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint i)
     P)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
VLSM_eq
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator P)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint i)
     P)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

  ‚Üí Prop

Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
strong_incl_initial_state_preservation
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;
    valid := valid
  |}
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;
    valid := valid
  |}

PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
strong_incl_transition_preservation
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;
    valid := valid
  |}
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;
    valid := valid
  |}

  ‚Üí Prop

  (id (sX i), iom).1 (id (sX i), iom).2 (existT i l)
  sX

oom: option message
vtransition
  {|
    vtype := let (vtype, _) := IM i in vtype;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
        transition := transition;
        valid := valid
      |}
  |} l (s, iom) = (s', oom)
‚Üí vtransition
    {|
      vtype := let (vtype, _) := IM i in vtype;
      vmachine :=
        {|
          initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
          s0 := s0;
          initial_message_prop :=
            Œª m : message,
              initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
          transition := transition;
          valid := valid
        |}
    |} (id l) (id s, iom) = (id s', oom)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
l: label
s: state
iom: option message
s': state
oom: option message
vtransition (IM i) l (s, iom) = (s', oom)
‚Üí (let (s'X, om') :=
     let (si', om') :=
       vtransition (IM i) l
         (lift_to_composite_state IM
            (`(composite_s0 IM)) i s i, iom) in
     (state_update IM
        (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s) i si', om') in
   (s'X i, om')) = (s', oom)

s': state
oom: option message

        si', om') in

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
l: label
s: state
iom: option message
j: index
li: vlabel (IM j)
sX: composite_state IM
HlX: match decide (i = j) with
| left e =>
    Some
      (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) li
         e)
| right _ => None
end = Some l
H: sX i = s
Hv: valid_state_prop (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  sX
‚àß option_valid_message_prop
    (composite_vlsm IM constraint) iom
  ‚àß constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
      (existT j li) (sX, iom)
valid_state_prop X sX
‚àß option_valid_message_prop X iom
  ‚àß constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
      (existT i l) (sX, iom)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
l: label
s: state
iom: option message
j: index
li: vlabel (IM j)
sX: composite_state IM
H0: i = j
HlX: Some
  (eq_rect_r (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n)) li H0) =
Some l
H: sX i = s
Hv: valid_state_prop (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  sX
‚àß option_valid_message_prop
    (composite_vlsm IM constraint) iom
  ‚àß constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
      (existT j li) (sX, iom)
valid_state_prop X sX
‚àß option_valid_message_prop X iom
  ‚àß constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
      (existT i l) (sX, iom)

    by inversion HlX; subst.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
strong_incl_transition_preservation
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;
    valid := valid
  |}
  {|
    initial_state_prop := initial_state_prop;
    s0 := s0;
    initial_message_prop :=
      Œª m : message, initial_message_prop m ‚à® P m;
    transition := transition;

  |}
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
l: label
s: state
iom: option message
s': state
oom: option message
Ht: (let (s'X, om') :=
   let (si', om') :=
     vtransition (IM i) l
       (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s i, iom) in
   (state_update IM
      (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s) i si',
   om') in
 (s'X i, om')) = (s', oom)
vtransition (IM i) l (s, iom) = (s', oom)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
P: message ‚Üí Prop
Hinits: ‚àÄ m : message,
  vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m ‚Üí P m
l: label
s: state
iom: option message
s': state
oom: option message
si': state
om': option message
Ht: (state_update IM
   (state_update IM (`(composite_s0 IM)) i s) i
   si' i, om') = (s', oom)
(si', om') = (s', oom)

    by state_update_simpl.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_eq
  pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  (pre_composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint
     i)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_eq
  pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  (pre_composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint
     i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_eq
  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator)
        (Œª _ : message, True)
  |}
  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator
           (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
           (type (IM i))
           (composite_project_label IM i)
           (Œª s : vstate
                    (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
              s i) (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
           (lift_to_composite_state' IM i))
  |}

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_eq
  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM
              constraint i)) (Œª _ : message, True)
  |}
  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator
           (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
           (type (IM i))
           (composite_project_label IM i)
           (Œª s : vstate
                    (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
              s i) (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
           (lift_to_composite_state' IM i))
  |}

  apply VLSM_eq_sym,
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_is_pre_loaded_with_True
      (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint i)).
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
VLSM_projection X
  pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  (composite_project_label IM i) (Œª s : vstate X, s i)


message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

  pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  (composite_project_label IM i) (Œª s : vstate X, s i)

  |} (composite_project_label IM i)
  (Œª s : vstate X, s i)
message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

  |}
  {|

      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;

      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  |}

  
message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine := ?MY
  |} (composite_project_label IM i)
  (Œª s : vstate X, s i)
 apply composite_projection_induced_validator_is_projection.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

  {|

      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;

      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        (projection_induced_validator
           (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
           (type (IM i))
           (composite_project_label IM i)
           (Œª s : vstate
                    (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
              s i) (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
           (lift_to_composite_state' IM i))
  |}
  {|
    vtype :=
      type composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator;
    vmachine :=
      pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  |}
 apply VLSM_eq_sym, pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator_iff.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

  ‚Üí Prop

  ¬¨ vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m
VLSM_eq composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint i)

message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

  ¬¨ vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m
VLSM_eq
  {|
    vtype := type (IM i);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator)
        (Œª _ : message, False)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := type (IM i);
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_validator_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM constraint) (type (IM i))
        (composite_project_label IM i)
        (Œª s : vstate (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
           s i) (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
        (lift_to_composite_state' IM i)
  |}

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

i: index

  ¬¨ vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m
VLSM_eq
  {|
    vtype := type (IM i);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM
              constraint i)) (Œª _ : message, False)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := type (IM i);
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_validator_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM constraint) (type (IM i))
        (composite_project_label IM i)
        (Œª s : vstate (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
           s i) (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
        (lift_to_composite_state' IM i)
  |}

  apply VLSM_eq_sym,
    (vlsm_is_pre_loaded_with_False
      (composite_vlsm_induced_validator IM constraint i)).
Qed.

Definition valid_preloaded_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  : VLSM message :=
  pre_loaded_vlsm composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator (valid_message_prop X).


message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

i: index

  valid_preloaded_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
  pre_composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator

message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (m : message),
  input_valid
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator) l
    (s, Some m)
  ‚Üí valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_vlsm
         composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
         (valid_message_prop X)) m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
PreXi:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i): VLSM message
m: message
Hm: option_valid_message_prop X (Some m)
valid_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     composite_vlsm_induced_projection_validator
     (valid_message_prop X)) m

  by apply initial_message_is_valid; right.
Qed.

End sec_component_projection_validator_alt.

VLSM self-validation

Section self_validator_vlsm.

Context
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  .
Let us fix a (regular) VLSM X. X is a self-validator if for any arguments satisfying valid where the state is reachable in the pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm, the arguments are also a valid_state and valid_message for the original VLSM. 
Definition self_validator_vlsm_prop :=
  forall (l : label) (s : state) (om : option message),
    input_valid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, om) ->
    input_valid X l (s, om).
In the sequel we will show that a VLSM with the self_validator_vlsm_property is trace-equal to its associated pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm, basically meaning (due to Lemma byzantine_pre_loaded_with_all_messages) that all traces with the byzantine_trace_property associated to self-validator VLSMs are also valid_traces for that VLSM, meaning that the VLSM cannot exhibit byzantine behavior. 
Context
  (Hvalidator : self_validator_vlsm_prop)
  (PreX := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  .
Let PreX be the pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm associated to X. From Lemma vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm we know that X is included in PreX.
To prove the converse we use the self_validator_vlsm_property to verify the conditions of meta-lemma VLSM_incl_finite_traces_characterization. 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
VLSM_incl PreX X


message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
VLSM_incl PreX X

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  input_valid
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
    l (s, om) ‚Üí input_valid X l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
VLSM_incl PreX X

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  input_valid
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) l
    (s, om)
  ‚Üí input_valid
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
      (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
VLSM_incl PreX {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
VLSM_incl_part
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) M

  (* redcuction to inclusion of finite traces. *)
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
‚àÄ (s : vstate
         {|
           vtype := T;
           vmachine :=
             {|
               initial_state_prop :=
                 vinitial_state_prop
                   {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
               s0 := s0;
               initial_message_prop :=
                 Œª _ : message, True;
               transition :=
                 vtransition
                   {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
               valid :=
                 vvalid
                   {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
             |}
         |}) (tr : list
                     (vtransition_item
                        {|
                          vtype := T;
                          vmachine :=
                            {|
                              initial_state_prop :=
                                vinitial_state_prop
                                  {|
                                    vtype := T;
                                    vmachine := M
                                  |};
                              s0 := s0;
                              initial_message_prop :=
                                Œª _ : message, True;
                              transition :=
                                vtransition
                                  {|
                                    vtype := T;
                                    vmachine := M
                                  |};
                              valid :=
                                vvalid
                                  {|
                                    vtype := T;
                                    vmachine := M
                                  |}
                            |}
                        |})),
  finite_valid_trace
    {|
      vtype := T;
      vmachine :=
        {|
          initial_state_prop :=
            vinitial_state_prop
              {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
          s0 := s0;
          initial_message_prop := Œª _ : message, True;
          transition :=
            vtransition
              {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
          valid :=
            vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        |}
    |} s tr
  ‚Üí finite_valid_trace {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      s tr

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop

       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s

        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l

      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s

        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)

  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
s: vstate
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};

          Œª _ : message, True;

          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};

          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
tr: list
  (vtransition_item
     {|
       vtype := T;
       vmachine :=
         {|
           initial_state_prop :=
             vinitial_state_prop
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           s0 := s0;
           initial_message_prop :=
             Œª _ : message, True;
           transition :=
             vtransition
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           valid :=
             vvalid
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
         |}
     |})
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
Hs: initial_state_prop s
finite_valid_trace {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
  tr

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T

  (om : option message),

       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s

         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})

        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l

      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s

        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)

  (vtransition_item
     {|
       vtype := T;
       vmachine :=
         {|

               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};

             Œª _ : message, True;

               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};

               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
         |}
     |})

  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
Hs: initial_state_prop s
finite_valid_trace_from
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s tr

  (* reverse induction on the length of a trace. *)
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
s: vstate
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s []
Hs: initial_state_prop s
finite_valid_trace_from
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s []
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
s: vstate
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
x: vtransition_item
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}

  (vtransition_item
     {|
       vtype := T;
       vmachine :=
         {|
           initial_state_prop :=
             vinitial_state_prop
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           s0 := s0;

           transition :=

               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};

T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)

  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s []

‚Üí finite_valid_trace_from
    {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s tr
input_valid_transition {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
  (l x) (finite_trace_last s tr, input x)
  (destination x, output x)

    
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)

  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message

    vtype := T;

      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
x: vtransition_item
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
tr: list
  (vtransition_item
     {|
       vtype := T;
       vmachine :=
         {|
           initial_state_prop :=
             vinitial_state_prop
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           s0 := s0;
           initial_message_prop :=
             Œª _ : message, True;
           transition :=
             vtransition
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           valid :=
             vvalid
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
         |}
     |})
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
Hvx: input_valid
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} (l x) (finite_trace_last s tr, input x)
Htx: transition (l x)
  (finite_trace_last s tr, input x) =
(destination x, output x)
Hs: initial_state_prop s
IHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
‚Üí finite_valid_trace_from
    {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s tr
input_valid_transition {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
  (l x) (finite_trace_last s tr, input x)
  (destination x, output x)

    
message: Type
X: VLSM message
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
Hvalidator: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (om : option message),
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}) s
  ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
         {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
      om
    ‚àß vvalid
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} l
        (s, om)
  ‚Üí valid_state_prop
      {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s
    ‚àß option_valid_message_prop
        {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
        om ‚àß valid l (s, om)
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
s: vstate
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
x: vtransition_item
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |}
tr: list
  (vtransition_item
     {|
       vtype := T;
       vmachine :=
         {|
           initial_state_prop :=
             vinitial_state_prop
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           s0 := s0;
           initial_message_prop :=
             Œª _ : message, True;
           transition :=
             vtransition
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
           valid :=
             vvalid
               {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
         |}
     |})
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
Hvx: input_valid
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} (l x) (finite_trace_last s tr, input x)
Htx: transition (l x)
  (finite_trace_last s tr, input x) =
(destination x, output x)
Hs: initial_state_prop s
IHtr: finite_valid_trace_from
  {|
    vtype := T;
    vmachine :=
      {|
        initial_state_prop :=
          vinitial_state_prop
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        s0 := s0;
        initial_message_prop :=
          Œª _ : message, True;
        transition :=
          vtransition
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |};
        valid :=
          vvalid
            {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
      |}
  |} s tr
‚Üí finite_valid_trace_from
    {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} s tr
input_valid {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |} (l x)
  (finite_trace_last s tr, input x)

    (* using the [self_validator_vlsm_prop]erty. *)
    revert Hvx; apply Hvalidator.
Qed.
We conclude that X and PreX are trace-equal. 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
VLSM_eq PreX X


message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
VLSM_eq PreX X

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
t: Trace
valid_trace_prop
  {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX |}
  t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine X |} t
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
t: Trace
valid_trace_prop
  {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine X |} t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {|
      vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX
    |} t

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
t: Trace
valid_trace_prop
  {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX |}
  t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine X |} t
 apply pre_loaded_with_all_messages_self_validator_vlsm_incl.
  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
t: Trace
valid_trace_prop
  {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine X |} t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {|
      vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX
    |} t
 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
t: Trace
Hincl:= vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM_incl X
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
valid_trace_prop
  {| vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine X |} t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {|
      vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX
    |} t

    
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hvalidator: self_validator_vlsm_prop
T: VLSMType message
M: VLSMMachine T
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM message
t: Trace
Hincl:= vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
  {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}: VLSM_incl {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |})
valid_trace_prop
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreX;
    vmachine :=
      machine {| vtype := T; vmachine := M |}
  |} t
‚Üí valid_trace_prop
    {|
      vtype := vtype PreX; vmachine := machine PreX
    |} t

    apply Hincl.
Qed.

End self_validator_vlsm.
